unnormalised: My son Rakesh appeared for his Class 10 exams in March 2024 and scored 92% - we are so proud! Now he's prepping for JEE after 12th standard next year from DPS, Vasant Kunj.
normalised: My son Rakesh appeared for his Class ten exams in March two thousand and twenty four and scored ninety two percent - we are so proud! Now he's prepping for J-E-E after twelfth standard next year from D-P-S, Vasant Kunj.
